Title: jouba Images Converter
Description: Convert piles of images to all key formats at one go! Make quick adjustments - resize, rotate. Get your pictures ready to be printed or uploaded to websites!
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Convert piles of images to all key formats at one go! Make quick adjustments - resize, rotate. Get your pictures ready to be printed or uploaded to websites!




The main features of jouba Images Converter

Convert between Various Formats

Convert and save images between all key formats such as JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, etc.

Convert Fast

Use the Batch mode and convert several files or a whole folder to a desired format with one button click!

Fit Images to Video Frame Size

Resize your photos to popular printing formats. Prepare your images for future slideshows that you can upload to popular websites.

Apply Effects

Get the effect of aging in old photographs, or make your pictures look "classic" and use the black-and-white effect.

Copyright Your Pictures

Select a logo or write a phrase and apply it to all converted pics as a personal watermark.

Multilingual

Images Converter interface is available in English, French, German, and Italian.


Microsoft Windows 7 Support

Images Converter is compatible with the latest version of Microsoft Windows.

Requirements:
  • Microsoft .net Framework 4.0 : install.
